title: StandOuter: interactive outerwear for improving posture using self-conscious feelings.
abstract: People adopt various habits in their lives. They sometimes got into negative habits that adversely affect their health. To cure the negative habits, people need to recognize the habits in real-time, and keep motivation of improvement in long term. In this study, we focus on negative habits of postures (e.g., standing/sitting postures). We propose a wearable system, "StandOuter" that helps people improve negative habits of postures in consideration of the eyes of others.
